Unfortunately I do not have time to add this feature. It should not be difficult to add in though. Something like:

if keepdims:

    tensor = tf.expand_dims(tensor, axis)

body:
Unfortunately I do not have time to add this feature.  It should not be difficult to add in though.  Something like:

```
if keepdims:
  for_ in range(ndims_mask):
    tensor = tf.expand_dims(tensor, axis)
```
